ValidationRule.description: Block some percentage for some class.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), NOT($Permission.Sales_Admin), OR( OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Premium__c), '9'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Premium__c), '11'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Premium__c), '13'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Premium__c), '21'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Premium__c), '22'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Premium__c), '23') ), OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Comfort__c), '9'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Comfort__c), '11'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Comfort__c), '13') ), OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Standard__c), '7'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Standard__c), '9'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Standard__c), '11'), CONTAINS(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Standard__c), '13') ) ) )
